categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: Line was a member of the Kouhun, a secret society of assassins that operated in the Anoat sector. At some point during the Iron Blockade, Line was asked to either kill or abduct an Imperial slaver. Before doing so, he challenged a young Smuggler from Burnin Konn to what he called "a little game," daring the scoundrel to accomplish the mission before him and earn his respect.
